Application Text Resume Fields
Application Agreement

field.name: certification_agreement_bullet1
field.default: The company and other persons or employers are released from all liability brought forth by any investigation resulting from my submission of this electronic application and the data contained here in.
field.label: COM_JOBGROKAPP_VIEWS_APPLICATION_TMPL_FORM_XML_AGREEMENT_BULLET_1

field.name: certification_agreement_bullet2
field.default: The information in this application is true and complete to the best of my knowledge. Any falsification, misrepresentation, or omission on this application can be cause for denial or termination of employment.
field.label: COM_JOBGROKAPP_VIEWS_APPLICATION_TMPL_FORM_XML_AGREEMENT_BULLET_2

field.name: certification_agreement_bullet3
field.default: If hired, my employment is voluntary, meaning that either party can employment at any time for any reason. Upon acceptance of employment if a position is offered, I agree to abide by all existing and future company rules and regulations. The company reserves the right to change any working agreement as deemed necessary.
field.label: COM_JOBGROKAPP_VIEWS_APPLICATION_TMPL_FORM_XML_AGREEMENT_BULLET_3

field.name: certification_agreement_bullet4
field.default: Any employment offer is contingent open my providing proof of identity and eligibility to work the country of employ.
field.label: COM_JOBGROKAPP_VIEWS_APPLICATION_TMPL_FORM_XML_AGREEMENT_BULLET_4

field.name: certification_agreement_bullet5
field.default: I have read and reviewed the information provided in this application and the above statements. By signing this application for employment I certify that I understand all parts of it and have answered all questions completely and fully.
field.label: COM_JOBGROKAPP_VIEWS_APPLICATION_TMPL_FORM_XML_AGREEMENT_BULLET_5

field.name: certification_agreement_bullet6
field.default: I understand that by typing my name in the signature box below and submitting this application electronically, this becomes a legal and binding contract.
field.label: COM_JOBGROKAPP_VIEWS_APPLICATION_TMPL_FORM_XML_AGREEMENT_BULLET_6

field.name: text_custom_yes_no
field.default: Enter a yes/no question.
field.label: COM_JOBGROKAPP_VIEWS_APPLICATION_TMPL_FORM_XML_CUSTOM_YES_NO_TEXT

field.default: Email Notification Settings
